從基礎的數位影像處理開始，逐步介紹空間域、頻率域、圖形識別、影像壓縮、影像載體與偽裝、影像品質評估與分析、影像智慧權、數位浮水印等課題。課程中將以實用的觀點探討這些課題，並著重以程式處理影像之基本訓練。

1. Image Representation: (A)Gray-level image from RGB to YIQ or YCrCb; (B) Gray-level image from RGB to HSI; Binary image from gray-level 2. (A) Arithmetic Operations:Image Addition， Image Subtraction， Image Complement， Image Multiplication And Division; (B) Logic Operations: AND， OR， and NOT (Complement) 3. Zoom Operations: (A) Zero-order hold; (B) First-order hold 4. Histogram Modification: (A) Histogram stretch; (B) Histogram shrink; (C) Histogram slide 5. Histogram Equalization 6. Noise Models: (A) Gaussian noise; (B) Uniform noise; (C) Impulse noise 7. Smoothing Filters: low-pass filter， median filter， midpoint filter， alpha-trimmed mean filter， arithmetic mean filter， and contra-harmonic mean filter. 8. Sharping Filters: High-pass Filter， High-boost Filter，Laplacian Filter， Difference Filter 9. Image Segmentation:Color Segmentation， Point Detection， Line Detection， Sobel operator， Prewitt operator 10. Morphological: Dilation ， Erosion， Opening，Closing
